name: Blanco - CO (Cigar Obsession) 1st Third - Toro
additionalNotes: For years, Cigar Obsession has been a trusted online source for cigar smokers everywhere, and David Blanco of Blanco Cigars has contributed his own widely-respected expertise towards creating a line of cigars that shows appreciation for Cigar Obsession and their mission to provide invaluable information to the smoking community.Â  The 1st Third is a medium-bodied Nicaraguan cigar by Plasencia sporting a Sumatra wrapper and Nicaraguan binder with a combination of fillers from Nicaragua and Honduras. Enjoy earthy notes of pepper and creamy cocoa mixed with cinnamon and roasted nuts.
